subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Robustelli was an All-Pro six times and the N.F.L.’s most outstanding player in 1962, helping the Giants’ defense evoke a celebrity aura.
snippet: Robustelli was an All-Pro six times and the N.F.L.’s most outstanding player in 1962, helping the Giants’ defense evoke a celebrity aura.
